pullrequest.title: Fix transparency correction for opaque materials

content.html:
this should make it work:

diff -r dd946adaaae7 gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc
--- a/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc    Wed Aug 12 16:47:58 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc    Thu Aug 13 18:32:50 2015 -0700
@@ -1418,22 +1418,22 @@
         {
           pass = technique->getPass(passCount);

-          // Need to fix transparency
-          if (!pass->isProgrammable() &&
-              pass->getPolygonMode() == Ogre::PM_SOLID)
-          {
-            pass->setSceneBlending(Ogre::SBT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA);
-          }
-
           if (this->dataPtr->transparency > 0.0)
           {
             pass->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
             pass->setDepthCheckEnabled(true);
+            // Need to fix transparency
+            if (!pass->isProgrammable() &&
+                pass->getPolygonMode() == Ogre::PM_SOLID)
+            {
+              pass->setSceneBlending(Ogre::SBT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA);
+            }
           }
           else
           {
             pass->setDepthWriteEnabled(true);
             pass->setDepthCheckEnabled(true);
+            pass->setSceneBlending(Ogre::SBT_REPLACE);
           }

           dc = pass->getDiffuse();
